title: Glenanore Estate shines with three  all-time record prices
body_lines: Glenanore Estate showcased its outstanding capabilities in manufacturing top quality ‘Ceylon Tea’ by achieving three all-time record prices in the Uva High Region at the weekly tea auction held on 9 March.
They are BOP1 Grade recorded a price of Rs. 1,350 per kg; OP1 Grade recorded a price of Rs. 1,100 per kg and  FBOPF1 Grade recorded a price of Rs. 1,080 per kg.
These lines of tea were sold and marketed by Forbes & Walker Tea Brokers Ltd.
Glenanore Estate is ISO 22000:2018 and HACCP certified, and is managed by Agarapatana Plantations Limited under the stewardship of Senior Manager Gayan Wijesekara.
